info.name: Booking API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for managing bookings in EventPlace platform

request.description: Check if a service is available for the specified dates
Get all bookings for logged-in customer
Request cancellation of a booking (Customer only)
Request to extend booking checkout time (Customer only)
Get upcoming bookings for customer or vendor
Get all bookings for vendor's services
Accept or reject booking request (Vendor only)
Process refund for cancelled booking (Vendor only)
Accept or reject extension request (Vendor only)
Get all bookings in the system (Admin only)
Get detailed booking information by ID
